data.title: EAT, DRINK AND PLAY POOL:
data.text: this is a "full bar", in Utah that means they serve alcohol and beer.We had a pitcher of beer played a few games of pool and had lunch. The food was fantastic, we split a salmon salad. Jeff cooked the salmon to perfection and it was served on a delicious bed of veggies with avocado egg onion and more. It was fantastic. We stopped in after the Antiques Road Show was in Salt Lake City. Highly recommended.
